titles.title: HP309 O God, O Spirit known to us

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O God, O Spirit known to us
Through wonders of creation,
Help us to see,
Help us to care,
Help us to find you everywhere
And voice our adoration.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O God, O Spirit known to us
Through Christ's victorious living,
Help us to love,
Help us to dare,
Help us to serve you everywhere
Through sacrificial giving.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O God, O Spirit known to us
Through lives of dedication,
Help us to pray,
Help us to share,
Help us to praise you everywhere;
And be our inspiration.
